original_title: Verborgene Sch√∂nheit: Die Orchideen des Saaletals
overview: Orchids are counted among the rarest and most endangered, but also the most beautiful species of plant in Germany. In this movie David Cebulla is in search of these unique plants around his hometown Jena, a university town situated in central Germany. He wants to capture impressive footage in order to make a statement for the protection and preservation of nature.
title: Hidden Beauty - The Orchids of the Saale Valley
